  • Upgraded ORCID Certified Service Provider program Now Available for Scholarly Services
    by Élan Young
    July 31, 2023
    We are excited to announce that our upgraded ORCID Certified Service Provider (CSP) program is now available to service providers with an ORCID integration! Certification is a free-of-charge service offered by ORCID for any integration that meets ORCID’s best practice-based criteria.  As part of the upgraded CSP program, ORCID provides an enhanced set of benefits… Read more: Upgraded ORCID Certified Service Provider program Now Available for Scholarly Services
  • New to the ORCID Record Interface—Professional Activities
    by Tom Demeranville
    July 26, 2023
    Enabling transparent and trustworthy connections between researchers and their contributions and affiliations is at the center of ORCID’s mission. These connections allow researchers to not only be recognized for the many different types of valuable contributions they make to the scholarly record, it also creates transparency around which institutions are funding the work and employing… Read more: New to the ORCID Record Interface—Professional Activities
  • ORCID Increases Financial Support for ROR
    by Élan Young
    July 18, 2023
    As use cases build in the global research ecosystem around persistent identifiers (PIDs) for research organizations, ORCID has recently increased its financial commitment to the first and only openly available organization identifier—Research Organization Registry (ROR). Like ORCID, ROR operates an open, community-driven, noncommercial PID registry that is part of the interconnected network of global scholarly… Read more: ORCID Increases Financial Support for ROR
  • ORCID US Community Consortium Celebrates 200th Member!
    by Élan Young
    July 5, 2023
    We are delighted to announce that the ORCID US Community consortium, which is the largest ORCID community of practice in the world, recently signed its 200th member in July. Formed in 2018 by four existing consortia in the US with 88 members, the community had 100 member organizations in late 2018 and now celebrates doubled… Read more: ORCID US Community Consortium Celebrates 200th Member!
  • Turkish, German, and Polish Added — Registry Now Supports 95% of Languages of Users
    by Élan Young
    June 9, 2023
    We are delighted to announce that we just added Turkish, German, and Polish languages to the ORCID Registry, infosite, and support site, bringing the total number of languages we offer to 15. Users who prefer to view their record in one of these languages have the option to do so by setting their language display… Read more: Turkish, German, and Polish Added — Registry Now Supports 95% of Languages of Users
